heroTitle: A Sacred Encounter with Ancestral Medicines
heroSubtitle: Discover how Ayahuasca can transform your life, bringing you clarity, emotional healing, and a renewed connection with the universe. Join us in this transformative experience, where tradition meets expert guidance for an unforgettable journey.
guidesSubtitle: Beings of light and healing dedicated to your transformation. With years of experience and a deep respect for traditions, our guides will accompany you every step of your journey, ensuring a safe, loving, and deeply connected environment.
footerText: © {{year}} The Art of Healing. All rights reserved.
chatbotWelcome: Hello! I am your Spiritual Guide. I'm here to help you on your healing path. How can I guide you today?
chatbotError: I'm sorry, I'm having trouble connecting right now. Please try again in a moment.
allCeremoniesSubtitle: A journey of healing and self-discovery.

deleteCeremonyConfirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. The ceremony will be permanently deleted.
errorDeletingCeremony: There was an error deleting the ceremony.
errorDuplicatingCeremony: There was an error duplicating the ceremony.
mediaRequiredDescription: Please provide an image/video URL or upload a file.
errorPositiveNumber: The '{{field}}' field must be a positive number.
finishCeremonyConfirmDescription: This ceremony will be moved to the past events section and can no longer be booked.
ceremonyMovedToPast: The ceremony now appears in past events.
defaultContributionText: You can reserve your spot with a 50% contribution.
fullPlanUpTo: Full plan for up to 4 people.
inactivateCeremonyConfirmDescription: The ceremony will not be visible to users, but you can reactivate it later.
guidesPageSubtitle: Beings of light and healing dedicated to your transformation. With years of experience and a deep respect for traditions, our guides will accompany you on every step of your journey, ensuring a safe, loving, and deeply connected environment.
editGuideDescription: Update the guide's information. Changes will be reflected on the site.
deleteGuideConfirmDescription: This action will permanently delete the guide from the database.
exploreMedicineDescription: Discover the power and wisdom of Ayahuasca, an ancestral medicine that opens the doors to deep healing and self-knowledge.
exploreGuidesDescription: Meet the facilitators who will accompany you on your journey, beings dedicated to holding a space of love, respect, and safety.
contactCommunityText: Follow us on our social networks to stay connected, find out about upcoming events, and become part of our growing family.
whatIsAyahuascaDescription: Ayahuasca is an ancestral Amazonian medicine, a sacred brew resulting from the cooking of two master plants: the Ayahuasca vine (Banisteriopsis caapi) and Chacruna leaves (Psychotria viridis). This visionary beverage has been used for centuries by indigenous peoples as a tool for physical, emotional, and spiritual healing, and to connect with the wisdom of the universe.
howAyahuascaWorksDescription: Ayahuasca acts as a purgative for the body, mind, and soul. On a biochemical level, the DMT from Chacruna (a potent visionary) is activated by the MAO inhibitors in the vine, allowing for a deep introspective experience. In this expanded state of consciousness, you can access repressed memories, understand behavioral patterns, and release emotional blockages, opening the way to comprehensive healing.
spiritualMasterDescription: More than a substance, Ayahuasca is considered a living intelligence, a master that teaches and guides. Each ceremony is a unique dialogue with this ancestral wisdom, offering the lessons you most need in your present moment. It shows you what you need to see, not necessarily what you want to see, always with a purpose of growth and love.
ayahuascaBenefitClarityDescription: Gain a renewed perspective on your life, your relationships, and your path. Ayahuasca can help you dissolve confusion and connect with your true purpose.
ayahuascaBenefitHealingDescription: Release deep-seated traumas, fears, and anxieties. The medicine allows you to process stagnant emotions in a safe and supportive environment, fostering forgiveness and self-acceptance.
ayahuascaBenefitConnectionDescription: Experience a profound sense of unity with yourself, with others, and with the universe. Strengthen your intuition and expand your consciousness beyond the everyday.
groupCeremonyDescription: A shared space where the group's energy enhances individual healing. Ideal for connecting with others on a similar journey.
privateCeremonyDescription: An intimate and personalized experience, designed to address your specific intentions with the exclusive attention of our guides.
loginSubtext: Enter your credentials to continue your journey.
googleSuccessDescription: You have signed in with your Google account.
errorInvalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address.
errorMinLength: The '{{field}}' field must be at least {{count}} characters long.
registerSubtext: Join our community to access exclusive content.
registerSuccessDescription: We have sent a verification email. Please check your inbox.
adminPanelSubtitle: Manage the application's content, users, and settings.
themeTabDescription: Modify the application's color palette for light and dark modes. Changes are applied in real-time.
themeUpdateReload: The page will reload to apply the changes.
userManagementSubtitle: Manage registered users and their roles.
allUsersDescription: Here you can view and manage all registered users.
sendEmailDescription: Compose and send an email to all registered users on the platform.
chatHistorySubtitle: Review all user interactions with the chatbot.
allConversationsDescription: Explore past conversations to better understand your users.
authRequiredDescription: You need an account to view the details of this ceremony.
preparationProcessDescription: Start a clean diet and set your intentions. It is a time of purification and introspection.
ceremonyProcessDescription: Participate in the sacred ritual, guided by our facilitators. It is a space for surrender and trust.
experienceProcessDescription: Navigate your inner world, receive visions, and release what no longer serves you. Each journey is unique and personal.
integrationProcessDescription: After the ceremony, we support you in incorporating the teachings into your daily life and continuing your growth.
dietSubtitle: Physical preparation is key. We recommend following these guidelines at least 3-7 days before and after the ceremony.
prohibitedFoodsList: Alcohol, caffeine, and other psychoactive substances
mentalPrepSubtitle: Your mental and emotional state is as important as your physical preparation.
meditationDescription: Dedicate time to meditate and be in silence to calm the mind and open the heart.
intentionsDescription: What are you looking to heal, understand, or release? Define a clear but flexible intention for your journey.
reflectionDescription: Write about your thoughts, fears, and hopes before the ceremony. It is a great tool for self-exploration.
emotionalHealingDescription: Ayahuasca can bring deep emotions to the surface. Prepare to be vulnerable, to cry, to laugh, and to forgive. Trust that everything that arises is for your highest good. You are in a safe space to feel and release without judgment.
whatToBringTitle: What Should I Bring to the Ceremony?
whatToBringSubtitle: Dress in comfortable clothing and prepare for a night of deep introspection.
comfortItemsList: Blanket and pillow for your space
A journal and pen for your reflections
essentialsList: Respect for the process and others
Trust in the medicine and the guides
preparationCtaDescription: Good preparation is the key to a deep and transformative experience. Discover how to align body, mind, and spirit.
questionnaireDescription: Your safety is our priority. Please answer honestly so we can take the best care of you.
questionnaireCompletedDescription: Thank you for completing the questionnaire. Your information has been saved. You can view your answers below.
questionnaireMedicalConditions: Do you have any pre-existing medical conditions (heart problems, high blood pressure, etc.)?
questionnaireMedicalConditionsDetails: If you answered 'yes', please provide details.
questionnaireMedication: Are you currently taking any medication (especially antidepressants or anxiolytics)?
questionnaireMedicationDetails: If you answered 'yes', please specify which ones and the dosage.
questionnaireMentalHealth: Do you have a history of mental health conditions (schizophrenia, bipolar disorder, psychosis)?
questionnaireMentalHealthDetails: If you answered 'yes', please provide more details.
questionnaireExperience: Have you had any previous experience with Ayahuasca or other master plants?
questionnaireExperienceDetails: If so, briefly describe your experience.
questionnaireIntention: What is your main intention or what are you looking for by participating in this ceremony?
questionnaireIntentionPlaceholder: e.g., I seek to heal past wounds, find my purpose, connect with my spirituality...
errorRequiredDetails: If your answer is 'yes', please provide details.
questionnaireSuccessDescription: Your information has been received. Thank you for your honesty!
questionnaireErrorDescription: Could not save the questionnaire. Please try again.
dialogSuccessDescription: You have completed a very important step. We now recommend that you review our ceremony preparation guide.
editProfileDescription: Update your personal information, email, or password.
errorCountryCodeRequired: Please select a country code if you enter a phone number.
enterPasswordToConfirm: To confirm, please enter your current password.
emailUpdatedSuccessDesc: Please verify your new email address.
questionnaireResponsesDescription: Review the user's health questionnaire responses.
noAnswersSubmitted: The user has not submitted the questionnaire yet.
mustBeLoggedInToView: You must be logged in to view this page.
